result.arabic_text: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
result.translation: Nta n’indishi ubasaba kw’irarikiramana ryawe ryo kwemera Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, burya Qor’ani warungikanwe, si ikindi kiretse ko ari urwibutso ku bantu bose kugira ngo bikebuke.
